verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Draw me close to You
Never let me go
I lay it all down again
To hear You say
That I'm Your friend

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my desire
No one else will do
'Cause nothing else
Could take Your place
To feel the warmth
Of Your embrace
Help me find the way
Lord, Bring me back to You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You're all I want
You're all I've ever needed
You're all I want
Help me know You are near
